articles.title: Instagram Gives All Users the Option to Pin Post Comments - Social Media Today
articles.description: After testing it out over the last few months, Instagram will now enable all users to pin up to three comments on their posts.
articles.content:
After Instagram first announced that it was testing the option back in May, the platform has today confirmed that all users can now pin up to three comments within their post interaction streams.
To… [+2056 chars]

articles.title: A closer look at Windows 10’s new Alt+Tab experience - WindowsLatest
articles.description: I don’t know about you but I regularly use the default Windows app switcher, which you can access by pressing Alt + Tab. On Windows 10, when you press Alt + Tab keyboard shortcut, you’ll open app/task switcher and you can move through the windows of the apps …
